nodes.text: The Star Slinger was a prototype swoop that was developed on Shesharile 5 by Chop Harlison.

The Star Slinger combined the chassis of a Mobquet Nebulon-Q racer with the repulsor coils of an Aratech 64-Y Swift 3, and used a combination of Tibanna gas and stabilizers in elevated concentrations to provide added speed and cooling. It was also armed with a blaster cannon that was controlled with the targeting systems of a Merr-Sonn PLX-2 missile launcher.
